sentence: The property has numerous activities on premises the best being the daily afternoon swim with the turtles
Gym was well equipped and the wifi worked well everywhere
Food atmosphere staff available activities all top notch
and the hotel offers various free water sports
it is location on a really beautiful beach home to turtles we consider ourselves privileged to have swam with them on several occasions thanks to Ryan from the watersports
Ryan on water sports is fabulous and if you go swimming with turtles with him it is even more extraordinary as he feeds them and plays with them and helps people get good photos etc
Great staff with the most amazing professional care from Ryan at water sports again
Free activities such as paddle boarding catamaran etc
The water sports area is well run with very able and competent staff
Very good the water sports took us to see the turtles
Although our room was nice other areas of the hotel were definitely not 5 the gymnasium was poor and no spa and the hotel is general tired looking and in definite need of refurbishment
The water sports staff were particularly rude
looking a little worn out now tried to use the watet sports at the hotel the guy told me he was going on his lunch 3 pm
our water sport guideI can not remember his name
Down side to this hotel was the woefully slow service from the bar staff the bad attitude from the water sports staff and lack of a fridge in the room
However I wish you had a separate spa area on the premises

The tennis courts are a great asset to the hotel but are in dire need of repair We would like to return for a stay after Xmas next year but would review what changes the hotel had made before deciding

We were lucky to be there at Easter this time so there was a Childrens club with activities however generally this is not the case and it is really lacking childrens facilities and general facilities such as not having a large shop selling a variety of things not having a spa not having a range of restaurants and food options
The range of non motorized water sports equipment is always available
After using the gym which is sufficient the breakfast buffet has something for everyone
